#(b)
rm(list=ls())
set.seed(1)
x=rnorm(100)
y=2*x+rnorm(100)
lm.fit1=lm(y~x-1) 
summary1=summary(lm.fit1)
summary1
lm.fit2=lm(x~y-1)
summary2=summary(lm.fit2)
summary2
beta=summary1$coefficients[,1]
alpha=summary2$coefficients[,1]
beta
alpha
identical(beta,alpha)
